weatherAlert.title: Weather Alert
weatherAlert.message: Heavy rainfall expected tomorrow. Prepare for potential waterlogging in low-lying areas. Postpone any planned fertilizer application until after the rain.

farmingTip.title: Farming Tip
farmingTip.message: Regularly monitor your crops for early signs of pest and disease problems. Early detection and treatment can prevent major crop losses and reduce treatment costs.

wheatDisease.title: Wheat Disease Warning
wheatDisease.description: High risk of fungal diseases due to recent rainfall and humid conditions.
actions: Inspect crops daily for early symptoms

irrigation.title: Optimal Irrigation Time
irrigation.description: Current soil moisture levels suggest irrigation is needed for better crop yield.
actions: Apply 2-3 inches of water per session

harvest.title: Harvest Recommendation
harvest.description: Rice crops in your area are ready for harvest based on maturity indicators.

fertilizer.title: Fertilizer Application
fertilizer.description: Second dose of fertilizer application is due for corn crops.
actions: Apply during cooler parts of the day

assistant.title: Voice Assistant
assistant.defaultPrompt: Tap microphone to speak or type your question

microphoneAccess.title: Microphone Access Required
microphoneAccess.message: Please allow microphone access to use voice features.

assistant.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your Kisan Setu voice assistant. I can help you with farming questions in English, Hindi, Punjabi, or Bengali. Ask me anything about crops, pests, fertilizers, or farming techniques.
